analysis.key_quote: Without due process protections, employees who are at risk of summarily losing their jobs will not report corrupt officials who are their superiors and will, instead, be more likely to participate in the corruptions.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting the negative consequences of removing due process protections, emphasizing concerns about corruption, politicization, and the erosion of a merit-based system in the civil service.
